description:
In this title you control a mysterious character and can walk and interact with objects in a 2D view, discovering grim scenes and also trying to find out more about the story by exploring the environments. This game features many triggering elements that should be avoided by people who are experiencing or are highly likely to experience depression. 


Warning: This game has many triggering elements in its core theme and should therefore be avoided by people who are experiencing any kind of depression. 


*The game is being developed in chapters that will be released overtime.
name: MORTO - Chapter 1
intro: This game is a heavy and enigmatic experience that focuses on a psychological horror story.
